tasks.label: build_runner - build
tasks.command: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs

tasks.label: auto_route - Generated code watch
tasks.command: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner watch

tasks.label: auto_route - Generated code one time
tasks.command: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner build

tasks.label: easy_localization - Generated file locale_keys.dart
tasks.command: fvm flutter pub run easy_localization:generate -S 'lib/resources/i18n/langs' -O 'lib/resources/i18n/generated' -o 'locale_keys.dart' -f keys
